title: Damn cheaters are REALLY FEELING THE BURN NOW!!

embed.description: Watch out, cheaters -- Epic is on the hunt for people spoiling the Fortnite: Battle Royale experience for others. In fact, they want to get cheaters so bad that they're hitting two cheaters with lawsuits. This isn't even the first time they've sued a cheater, either.

body: In their pockets that is lol
